Bitcoin Tracker App

An Android app that returns the current exchange rate of Bitcoin for a given currency

Created using: Android Studio, Java and XML, JSON


Bitcoin Tracker gives the user the current Bitcoin rate for a given currency. The Bitcoin Average API was used to retrieve exchange rate data : https://apiv2.bitcoinaverage.com/

The app shows the Bitcoin exchange rate in the following currencies:

  • Australian Dollar
  • Brazillian Real
  • Canadian Dollar
  • Chinese Yen
  • Euro
  • British Pound
  • Hong Kong Dollar
  • Japanese Yen
  • Pakistani Rupee
  • Polish Zloty
  • Russian Rouble
  • Swedish Krona
  • U.S. Dollar
  • South African Rand
